channel.title: Compute on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Compute on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: DCesv6, DCedsv6, ECesv6, and ECedsv6 confidential VMs
item.description:
Azure announced general availability of the DCesv6, DCedsv6, ECesv6, and ECedsv6 confidential VM series based on 5th Gen Intel Xeon processors with Intel Trust Domain Extensions (TDX).

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: AMD v6 confidential VMs in new regions for January 2026
item.description:
Azure DCa/ECa v6 AMD-based confidential VMs are now generally available in 11 additional regions.

  • Source: Azure Updates
